topics.body:
"@Randomosaur":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/538fc6bb63687236e4730000#post_538fc6bb63687236e4730000
Oh boy here we go. Depending on how long this bird has been gone, reintroducing it can have disastrous consequences. The habitat that it has been absent from is adapted to function without it. That bird may be in competition with others birds for food, territory and nesting areas. Even if they slowly reintroduce it, it may reproduce quickly and displace many other species.
topics.author: 5010fa077f123b1e4f00104e
